label: uncl5007
comment: Code specifying the monetary amount function.

values.label: Destination charge totals
values.comment: Code to indicate total charges levied at destination.

values.label: Alternative currency amount
values.comment: The amount is expressed in alternate currency.

values.label: Total message amount
values.comment: The total amount of the message.

values.label: Invoices total amount summary
values.comment: The summary of a number of invoices' total amounts.

values.label: Amount for Customs purposes
values.comment: Number of monetary units expressed in a specified currency for Customs purposes (see: 5004).

values.label: Financial transaction amount
values.comment: Amount refers to financial transaction.

values.label: Total(s) of deferred items
values.comment: To specify the total(s) of all deferred items from one reinsurance account.

values.label: Total(s) of open cash claims
values.comment: To specify the total(s) of all open cash claims from one reinsurance account.

values.label: Reinsurance account balance
values.comment: To specify the result(s) of the reinsurance account calculation.

values.label: Prepaid totals
values.comment: Totals of prepaid freight and charges.

values.label: Collect totals
values.comment: Totals of collect freight and charges.

values.label: Valuation amounts
values.comment: Code to indicate valuation amounts.

values.label: Prepayment amount
values.comment: The amount paid or to be paid before a business transaction occurs.

values.label: Alternative currency total amount
values.comment: The total amount expressed in an alternate currency.

values.label: Documentary credit amount
values.comment: Value expressed in monetary terms of the documentary credit.

values.label: Additional amounts covered: freight costs
values.comment: Freight costs are also covered under the documentary credit.

values.label: Additional amounts covered: insurance costs
values.comment: Insurance costs are also covered under the documentary credit.

values.label: Additional amounts covered: interest
values.comment: Interest on delayed or deferred payment is also covered under the documentary credit.

values.label: Additional amounts covered: inspection costs
values.comment: Goods inspection costs are also covered under the documentary credit.

values.label: Part of documentary credit amount
values.comment: Part of documentary credit subject to sight, deferred or acceptance payment when the documentary credit is available by mixed payment.

values.label: Amount of note
values.comment: Amount of debit or credit note.

values.label: Hash total
values.comment: Total sum of amounts specified for control purposes.

values.label: Cumulative total, this period
values.comment: Totals to date.

values.label: Period total
values.comment: Totals this measurement period.

values.label: Cumulative total, preceding period
values.comment: Total to the end of last measurement period.

values.label: Total balance credit risk covered
values.comment: The total balance of factored invoices which are covered for credit risk.

values.label: Labour costs
values.comment: Identifying costs related to labour resource.

values.label: Business credit amount
values.comment: Monetary amount(s) associated with business credit information.
